Trade/Device Name(s): Maximed Exichek TD 4224 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Maximed Exichek TD 4224 blood glucose monitoring system for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical method.
Indications for Use Summary: Indicated for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites for self-testing by persons with diabetes at home or healthcare professionals in clinical settings; not for neonatal or diabetes diagnosis/screening.
